head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REES, WILLIAM M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REES, WILLIAM M.

block.p: REES-William M. Of Rye, NY, 84, died Wednesday, July 26, 2000. Former chairman and chief executive officer (1970-1981) of The Chubb Corporation. Beloved father of W. Mason Rees of Rye, NY, Robin Rees Weeks of Palm Beach, Fla., and Adair Rees Levinson of New York, NY, and grandfather of four. Funeral services will be held on Tuesday, August 1, at 11 AM, at Christ's Church, located at Rectory St. between Boston Post Road (US Route 1) and Milton Road, in Rye, NY. For directions, contact the rectory at 914-967-1749. In lieu of flowers, the family suggests that memorial contributions be sent to New York United Hospital Medical Center, 406 Boston Post Road, Port Chester, New York 10573.
